confidence.name: Confidence
confidence.description: Questions to help you remember your strengths and resilience.

questions.question: Describe a time when something unexpectedly worked out for you.
What's something that you used to feel insecure about, but don't anymore?
What about your life would your childhood self be in awe of?
Who inspires you? In what ways are you like them?
Describe a situation where you said "no," and you're really glad that you did.
Describe a situation where you said "yes," and you're really glad that you did.
What's something you're proud of yourself for but haven't celebrated?
When was the last time you spoke up for yourself or someone else? How did it make you feel?
What's a promise you've made to yourself and kept?
Think of someone who believes in you. What would they say your strengths are?
